attributes.action: Hold a referendum to abolish the monarchy and establish a republic
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to hold a referendum to abolish the monarchy and establish a republic within Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

We the signatories believe that in times of austerity the Royal Family is a luxury our country cannot afford.

We therefore call for the establishment of a republic with elections for a president to be held.

We the people demand to be citizens not subjects.
